darkman70,

i have downloaded and there is only one file without file extension ... and it is not a folder as well...

so i DO NOT know how to open it...

is it rar or zip file?...

please advise...

It comes in a .zip file. If you are running a newer version of Windows (Vista, Win7, Win8) zip compatibility should be integrated into the desktop so all you need is to double click to open it. 

If you are using an older version (WinXP and older) you may need to download a software, WinRAR, to open the zip file.

Once you open the Zip file, navigate to the Adobe folder and follow the instructions in the original details above.

Unbelievable! Thank you so much...could not get Premiere Pro to work until this came along, takes 2 minutes...just follow directions!

Kevin

When downloaded it comes with no file extension. Adding the file extension .rar creates a .rar file but upon extraction it's returning multiple errors.
Adding the file extension .exe and running the app. is returning the error that the app. is not compatible with a Win7 64bit O/S

it is a zip file ... unzip it...

run the patch file in adobe folder ... pick encore to patch ... but with error code saying wrong file size...

how to resolve this wrong file size? ... which file size is referring to?...

cheers,

All those who claim that there is no file extension, does not having a basic Windows knowledge. They have checked "Hide extensions for known file types" option under 'Folder options->View' tab. File is a ZIP archive.

run the patch file in adobe folder ... pick encore to patch ... but with error code saying wrong file size...

how to resolve this wrong file size? ... which file size is referring to?...

cheers,

This option is checked by default. You can see extension in uTorrent, but never mind.

Finally a patch that works! I have tried everything and this is the only thing that did it for me :) I canned the file with Avast before using and it didn't give any warning, so I ran it as Administrator and now I can start Encore and Premiere with all sequence presets! :D Thanks alot!
